extendedInfo.description: Itâs a casual endless game into many innovative and fun. Properties, HighScores, Aachievements, Challengeâ¦â¦waiting for your conquering.With the background of the Industrial Revolution, the game draws a picture of the British mayor of Raiden, John, who pushed on with a great development of industry for money, destroyed the environment seriously.In the game, treadles which stand for all kinds of industrial production facility keep going up. Players must control John to go left and right, get properties, avoid inhaling gas or dropping into the ditch, and make more money. * Varying all the time, while the game going on. * Fluent execution, excellent operational feeling, intense visual impact. * Creative mechanism of scores, give a chance to show your swift operation and challenge the all players in the world. * Many kinds of properties bring a bran-new experience. * 15 kinds of achievements wait for your conquering

reviews.comment: The game sucks, boring, and not chalanging. The screenplay not full screen for galaxy tab. Uninstall.....
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: FC on Scroll tablet. Shame as I long for a steampunky game on my tablet.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Game is like doodle drop. Controls are great
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Seems interesting but doesn\'t work well on dell streak - opening screen is muddled and tends to fc.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Game not fullscreen on Galaxy Tab. Force closed on settings.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Lame sauce
reviews.comment: In the menu all the options are stacked on top of each other, making it hard to select and impossible to read. This is a falling platform style game, but there isn\'t much room for u to move down from platform to platform, and it\'s way too easy to touch the top and die. Totally not worth it.
reviews.author: Jessica Thompson
